summary: Encapsulates the expected characteristics of a layer’s inputs—data type, shape (with support for dynamic dimensions), rank constraints, specific axis sizes, optional presence, and named keys—so that tensors can be automatically validated against these rules when the layer is called.
business_intent: Offer a declarative mechanism for layers to declare and enforce input requirements, enabling early detection of mismatched tensors, clearer error messages, and more robust model construction.
